note:
Currently I work for Mozilla, Inc., the makers of Firefox and sponsors of Thunderbird. I work on developer workflow tools such as Bugzilla and Phabricator. I am pretty good at Perl and getting better at Python.

In the past I worked at Redhat from the early startup days to post IPO where I did QA and worked on various developer tools.

I use Fedora Linux as my daily workstation and also collect 8-bit retro-computing machines such as the Commodore 64, classic Macintosh, and IBM PC.
